data.title: Jeff Gordon - 2009 - Baseball
data.meta_description: Jeff Gordon (7) RHP  - 2010: Went a perfect 5-0 on the season, making seven starts in 14 appearances ... pitched 45.1 innings on the season, striking out 29 batters
data.text:
2010: Went a perfect 5-0 on the season, making seven starts in 14 appearances ... pitched 45.1 innings on the season, striking out 29 batters ... first appearance of the season came against Arkansas State Feb. 27 ... went four-consecutive outings without giving up a run March 13-April 3 ... first start of year came against UIC March 27 ... picked up the win against Parkside March 30, striking out two in 2.0 scoreless innings ... also earned the victory in his next outing against Cleveland State, tossing 4.1 innings of scoreless relief, giving up just three hits while striking out a pair ... named Horizon League Pitcher of the Week after his win against Valparaiso May 1, a combined shutout for UWM in which he pitched into the seventh, striking out three ... won his next start at Wright State May 8 ... fanned a career-best six against Butler May 14 ... started the first Horizon League Tournament championship game against Wright State May 29, again striking out six in 6.2 innings as UWM advanced to the final ... worked 4.0 innings against #1 Arizona State in the NCAA Tournament, giving up just one run on three hits.

2010 game-by-game in PDF Format

2009: Appeared in just six games in comeback from injury, seeing 9.1 innings of work in recording a 1-0 record and 0.96 ERA ... started the second game of the season against No. 6 Arizona State Feb. 21 ... earned the victory against Chicago State April 7, starting and throwing 4.0 scoreless innings, walking none and striking out three ... also started against Northern Illinois April 28 ... threw 1.1 scoreless innings against UIC May 23.

2009 game-by-game in PDF Format

2008: Redshirted and maintained junior eligibility.

Prior to UWM: Spent the 2005 and 2006 seasons at the University of San Francisco ... appeared in 15 games for the Dons in 2006, starting three times and saving three others ... struck out 17 in 26.0 innings ... ended the season with three scoreless appearances ... was a medical redshirt in 2005, striking out one batter in two innings before suffering an injury ... attended the College of Marin in California in 2007.

High School: Was a four-year letterwinner for the Wilcox Chargers in Santa Clara, Calif. ... named to the All-Central Coast Team senior year... twice named First Team All-De Anza Division and Pitcher of the Year ... named to the honor roll all four years of high school.

Personal: Son of Jeff and Brenda Gordon ... majoring in marketing ... goal is to help the team win the conference title and make the NCAA Tournament ... most memorable sports experiences are winning the CCS championship his senior year in high school and going to his first regional at USF in 2006 ... born on Sept. 1, 1985.
